My Fascination lies in building robust software solutions, and I look forward to exploring data science and devOps in the near future.

projects.name: University Android Application
projects.description: An android application that manages the data of the university. The project was created in Android Studio using Java. Firebase was used for the firestore database and realtime database.

projects.name: Money Management
projects.description: A web application that tracks the Expense and Income of the User. Front-end was developed using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly experience. JavaScript is used for the back-end, and Firebase is used for the real-time database.

projects.name: GraphQL Web Development

experiences.description: Designed and implemented GraphQL APIs to handle data flow between the front- end and the back -end systems. Implemented API routing for efficient communication between different components of the application. Monitored project resulting in improved visibility of key performance and enabling decision making at all levels of the organization.
